title: How President Trump has challenged a constitutional foundation
description: In his first year back in the White House, President Trump has presided over a sweeping expansion of executive power while eroding democratic norms.
content: In his first year back in the White House, President Trump has presided over a sweeping expansion of executive power while eroding democratic norms.
